Text:
245 kbps avg -V2 is NOT excellent quality. (And it's only Average Bit Rate)
The excellent MP3 quality is 320 kb/s CBR (Constant Bit Rate)
But if you copy the MP3 files, the quality will getting worse and worse.
The best is the FLAC audio format. (Free Losless Audio Codec)
As you can see it's LOSSLESS. So you can make hundreds of copies without lost the quality.
